metadata.description:
Kaitani is a young, up-and-coming star of the comedy group "Kaitani Kawamori". For some reason, Kaitani likes to always mess with Tarou Yamada, the group manager.
For someone who only wished to live a normal, uneventful life, Yamada couldn't help but feel uneasy around Kaitani.
"There's no way a star like him would find me interesting..."
A romantic story that is even more dramatic than a soap opera.
metadata.name: The Twisted King and I (Yaoi Manga)
